flavorText: The veneer of rationality peeled from the mage, revealing the spite and rage beneath.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Fassade des Vernünftigen fiel von dem Magier ab und ließ die Bosheit und den Zorn darunter hervorschauen.
foreignData.name: Anspornen
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl wird bis zum Ende des Zuges rot und greift in diesem Zug an, falls möglich.

foreignData.flavorText: El mago dejó la fachada de racionalidad, mostrando el despecho y la ira que había detrás.
foreignData.name: Incitar
foreignData.text: La criatura objetivo es roja hasta el final del turno y ataca este turno si puede.

foreignData.flavorText: Le vernis de rationalité du mage se craquela, révélant sa rage et sa malveillance.
foreignData.name: Incitation
foreignData.text: La créature ciblée devient rouge jusqu'à la fin du tour et elle attaque ce tour-ci si possible.

foreignData.flavorText: L'apparenza di razionalità venne tolta al mago, rivelando il rancore e la rabbia sottostante.
foreignData.name: Stimolare
foreignData.text: Una creatura bersaglio diventa rossa fino alla fine del turno e attacca in questo turno, se può farlo.

foreignData.flavorText: 道理の薄皮が剥がれた魔道士は、その下の悪意と憤怒をあらわにした。
foreignData.name: 扇動
foreignData.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで赤になるとともに、このターン、それは可能なら攻撃する。

foreignData.flavorText: A fina camada de racionalidade do mago descascou-se, revelando a maldade e a ira que se escondia por baixo.
foreignData.name: Instigar
foreignData.text: A criatura alvo torna-se vermelha até o final do turno e ataca neste turno se estiver apta.

foreignData.flavorText: Если сорвать с мага видимую рациональность, то обнажится озлобленность и кипящая внутри ярость.
foreignData.name: Подстрекание
foreignData.text: Целевое существо становится красным до конца хода и атакует в этом ходу, если может.

foreignData.flavorText: 法师的合理化矫饰悉数剥落，露出底下的怨恨与愤怒。
foreignData.name: 煽动
foreignData.text: 目标生物成为红色直到回合结束，且本回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 法師的合理化矯飾悉數剝落，露出底下的怨恨與憤怒。
foreignData.name: 煽動
foreignData.text: 目標生物成為紅色直到回合結束，且本回合若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。

name: Incite
originalText: Target creature becomes red until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.

rulings.text: Incite overwrites all of the targeted creature’s old colors, leaving it just red. It doesn’t matter what colors it used to be (even if, for example, it used to be red and green).
You may target any creature with Incite. It’s okay if that creature is already red. It’s also okay if it would be unable to attack that turn.

If, during its controller’s declare attackers step, a creature affected by Incite is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or is affected by “summoning sickness,” then that creature doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost, so the creature doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

text: Target creature becomes red until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
